text/plain:
'Utility functions and classes for calculating speed.

This module provides:
- FasterThanLightError: exception when FTL speed is calculated;
- calculate_speed: calculate speed given distance and time.
'

source:
"""Utility functions and classes for calculating speed.

This module provides:
- FasterThanLightError: exception when FTL speed is calculated;
- calculate_speed: calculate speed given distance and time.
